title: S17 Ep29: Supernatural News/Parashare: The Demon in the Stone Edition

description:
Darkness Radio Presents Supernatural News/Parashare: The Demon in the Stone Edition w/Beer City Bruiser!

It's been a bizarre week with a killing stone in Japan cracking open and releasing a DEMON! A family discovers an extra ghost child while they are swimming on vacation, and why are people not finding Bigfoot?Â 

PLUS: we have your emails and Parashare recordings to answer on today's show!

Check out where Beer City Bruiser will be knit one and pearl twoing next: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester/with_replies
